TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content: It's taken me two years and about 150 posts to get three points, so that means I'm either 4950 posts or 66 years away from my next bar!
169. *Don't you dare snicker.*

WOoo, 20 points. 80 to go ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Let me think of something witty to post...

Lol this thread went on way longer than I thought it would...

Also, 35 more! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

And I hardly even step foot in The Spacecraft Exchange.

Like 50 points.

Look at these, these might help.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121022-American-Fighter-Jet-Pack-Part-One](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121022-American-Fighter-Jet-Pack-Part-One)

I just hit four Light Green bars a little while ago... so, a ways to go. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I have noticed if you post in this thread you seem to get rep

Indeed, This might get locked as it is sort of a "rep farm"

hopefully not though. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
81 until my 3rd light green bar

Just remember: It's not the POSTERS' fault that they get rep from this. It's the person who REPS THEM's fault. If they want to give rep, so be it.

BTW, 25 more to go!
22 more for me. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Why ever not? I wasn't even thinking of that...but that's a tractor working on a screen. ( I mean technically its working in the processor and the screen is just showing light signals....but meh)
20 more to go! Can't wait for my 3rd rep bar!

12 points till 5 bars. Light green group, I'm coming for you!

EDIT: 11, new forum user gave me rep for helping him out. **WHAT?? A NEW FORUM USER USED THE REP BUTTON? WHAT HAS THIS WORLD COME TO**

I should really start to post some of my crazy ships in The Spacecraft Exchange.
